Introduction
This topic contains information on the pension election rights of the children of Veterans, including
elective rights of children when there is or is not a surviving spouse entitled to pension on December 31, 1978
an example of the effect of the discontinuance of a surviving spouse’s award on a child’s protected rate
an example of a case in which a surviving spouse reestablishes entitlement after 1978
effect of one child’s election on another child when there is no surviving spouse
an example of the effect of one child’s election on another child
, and
adjusting protected rates when an additional child is established with eligibility to current-law pension
only
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Elections Between Pension Programs
